analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/27/0x882f55ef7a30a3e643dbc3e6caec06a3368fcd10.sol:
	Contract SecondBountyWPTpayout_part1 has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/27/0x882f55ef7a30a3e643dbc3e6caec06a3368fcd10.sol#53-59)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

SecondBountyWPTpayout_part1.makePayout (/unique_chucks/27/0x882f55ef7a30a3e643dbc3e6caec06a3368fcd10.sol#68-78) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-company_token.mint(addressOfBountyMembers[i],bountyMembersAmounts[addressOfBountyMembers[i]]) (/unique_chucks/27/0x882f55ef7a30a3e643dbc3e6caec06a3368fcd10.sol#72-77)

SecondBountyWPTpayout_part1.makePayout has external calls inside a loop:
	- company_token.mint(addressOfBountyMembers[i],bountyMembersAmounts[addressOfBountyMembers[i]]) (/unique_chucks/27/0x882f55ef7a30a3e643dbc3e6caec06a3368fcd10.sol#72-77)
Parameter '' of Token.mint (/unique_chucks/27/0x882f55ef7a30a3e643dbc3e6caec06a3368fcd10.sol#12) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_scope_0' of Token.mint (/unique_chucks/27/0x882f55ef7a30a3e643dbc3e6caec06a3368fcd10.sol#12) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_company_token' of SecondBountyWPTpayout_part1. (/unique_chucks/27/0x882f55ef7a30a3e643dbc3e6caec06a3368fcd10.sol#39-40) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of SecondBountyWPTpayout_part1.setOwner (/unique_chucks/27/0x882f55ef7a30a3e643dbc3e6caec06a3368fcd10.sol#61) is not in mixedCase
